games.spiders

Class Spiderling

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.spiders.GameObject
        • games.spiders.Spider
          • games.spiders.Spiderling
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cutter, Spitter, Weaver

    public class Spiderling
extends Spider
    A Spider spawned by the BroodMother.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String busy
      When empty string this Spiderling is not busy, and can act.
      java.util.List<Spiderling> coworkers
      All the Spiderlings busy with the same work this Spiderling is doing, speeding up the task.
      Web movingOnWeb
      The Web this Spiderling is using to move.
      Nest movingToNest
      The Nest this Spiderling is moving to.
      double workRemaining
      How much work needs to be done for this Spiderling to finish being busy.

    • Field Detail

      • busy

        public java.lang.String busy
        When empty string this Spiderling is not busy, and can act. Otherwise a string representing what it is busy with, e.g. 'Moving', 'Attacking'.

      • coworkers

        public java.util.List<Spiderling> coworkers
        All the Spiderlings busy with the same work this Spiderling is doing, speeding up the task.

      • movingOnWeb

        public Web movingOnWeb
        The Web this Spiderling is using to move. Null if it is not moving.

      • movingToNest

        public Nest movingToNest
        The Nest this Spiderling is moving to. Null if it is not moving.

      • workRemaining

        public double workRemaining
        How much work needs to be done for this Spiderling to finish being busy. See docs for the Work forumla.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spiderling

        public Spiderling()
        Creates a new instance of a Spiderling. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public boolean attack(Spiderling spiderling)
        Attacks another Spiderling
        Parameters:
        spiderling - The Spiderling to attack.
        Returns:
        True if the attack was successful, false otherwise.

      • move

        public boolean move(Web web)
        Starts moving the Spiderling across a Web to another Nest.
        Parameters:
        web - The Web you want to move across to the other Nest.
        Returns:
        True if the move was successful, false otherwise.
